https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rNHdpeyBUki4n5tzEdEri5elJBq.jpg On December 21, 2012 four strangers on a journey of faith are drawn to an ancient temple in the heart of Mexico. For the Mayans it is the last recorded day. For NASA scientists it is a cataclysmic polar shift. For the rest of us, it is Doomsday. 2012 Doomsday
